title: Alice in Wonderland
creator_credit: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Ben Sharpsteen, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: Animated version of Lewis Carroll’s famous story about the delightful Alice who goes on a dream fantasy adventure where animals are like humans and everything is nonsense. Voices provided by Kathryn Beaumont, Ed Wynn, Richard Haydn and Stirling Holloway.
creator_credit_for_label: Clyde Geronimi, Hamilton Luske, Wilfred Jackson, Ben Sharpsteen, Walt Disney and Walt Disney Productions
